00012 Settings::Settings()
00013 {
00014     // read settings
00015     QSettings get;
00016     get.setPath("eckroth.net", "GeneralLedger");
00017     get.beginGroup("/GeneralLedger");
00018     
00019 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
00020     TCHAR myDocPath[MAX_PATH];
00021     char myDocPath2[MAX_PATH*2];
00022     SHGetFolderPath(NULL, CSIDL_PERSONAL, NULL, 0, myDocPath);
00023     wcstombs(myDocPath2, myDocPath, MAX_PATH * 2);
00024     clientPath = get.readEntry("/paths/clientPath", myDocPath2);
00025     exportPath = get.readEntry("/paths/exportPath", myDocPath2);
00026     importPath = get.readEntry("/paths/importPath", myDocPath2);
00027 #else
00028     QString myHome = std::getenv("HOME");
00029     clientPath = get.readEntry("/paths/clientPath", myHome);
00030     exportPath = get.readEntry("/paths/exportPath", myHome);
00031     importPath = get.readEntry("/paths/importPath", myHome);
00032 #endif
00033 
00034     defaultDb = get.readEntry("/database/defaultDb", "");
00035     defaultClient = get.readEntry("/database/defaultClient", "");
00036 
00037     defaultWidth = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/width", 700);
00038     defaultHeight = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/height", 500);
00039     defaultX = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/x", 0);
00040     defaultY = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/y", 0);
00041 
00042     printerPrinterName = get.readEntry("/printer/printerName", "");
00043     printerOutputToFile = (bool)get.readNumEntry("/printer/outputToFile", 0);
00044     printerOutputFileName = get.readEntry("/printer/outputFileName", "");
00045     printerPrintProgram = get.readEntry("/printer/printProgram", "");
00046     printerOrientation = (QPrinter::Orientation)get.readNumEntry("/printer/orientation", 0);
00047     printerPageSize = (QPrinter::PageSize)get.readNumEntry("/printer/pageSize", 2);
00048     printerPageOrder = (QPrinter::PageOrder)get.readNumEntry("/printer/pageOrder", 0);
00049     printerColorMode = (QPrinter::ColorMode)get.readNumEntry("/printer/colorMode", 0);
00050     printerPaperSource = (QPrinter::PaperSource)get.readNumEntry("/printer/paperSource", 6);
00051 
00052     PDFPaperSize = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/paperSize", 0);
00053     PDFPaperSizeWidth = get.readEntry("/PDF/paperSizeWidth", "");
00054     PDFPaperSizeHeight = get.readEntry("/PDF/paperSizeHeight", "");
00055     PDFPaperSizeUnits = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/paperSizeUnits", 0);
00056     PDFPassword = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/password", 0);
00057     PDFPermissionsNoPrint = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoPrint", 0);
00058     PDFPermissionsNoModify = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoModify", 0);
00059     PDFPermissionsNoCopy = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoCopy", 0);
00060     PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoAnnotate", 0);
00061 
00062     get.endGroup();
00063     
00064 }

00066 Settings::~Settings()
00067 {
00068     // write settings
00069     QSettings put;
00070     put.setPath("eckroth.net", "GeneralLedger");
00071     put.beginGroup("/GeneralLedger");
00072 
00073     put.writeEntry("/paths/clientPath", clientPath);
00074     put.writeEntry("/paths/exportPath", exportPath);
00075     put.writeEntry("/paths/importPath", importPath);
00076 
00077     put.writeEntry("/database/defaultDb", defaultDb);
00078     put.writeEntry("/database/defaultClient", defaultClient);
00079 
00080     put.writeEntry("/geometry/width", defaultWidth);
00081     put.writeEntry("/geometry/height", defaultHeight);
00082     put.writeEntry("/geometry/x", defaultX);
00083     put.writeEntry("/geometry/y", defaultY);
00084 
00085     put.writeEntry("/printer/printerName", printerPrinterName);
00086     put.writeEntry("/printer/outputToFile", (int)printerOutputToFile);
00087     put.writeEntry("/printer/outputFileName", printerOutputFileName);
00088     put.writeEntry("/printer/printProgram", printerPrintProgram);
00089     put.writeEntry("/printer/orientation", (int)printerOrientation);
00090     put.writeEntry("/printer/pageSize", (int)printerPageSize);
00091     put.writeEntry("/printer/pageOrder", (int)printerPageOrder);
00092     put.writeEntry("/printer/colorMode", (int)printerColorMode);
00093     put.writeEntry("/printer/paperSource", (int)printerPaperSource);
00094 
00095     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSize", PDFPaperSize);
00096     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeWidth", PDFPaperSizeWidth);
00097     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeHeight", PDFPaperSizeHeight);
00098     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeUnits", PDFPaperSizeUnits);
00099     put.writeEntry("/PDF/password", (int)PDFPassword);
00100     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoPrint", (int)PDFPermissionsNoPrint);
00101     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoModify", (int)PDFPermissionsNoModify);
00102     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoCopy", (int)PDFPermissionsNoCopy);
00103     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoAnnotate", (int)PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate);
00104 
00105     put.endGroup();
00106 }

00108 Settings* Settings::instance()
00109 {
00110     if(settings == 0)
00111         settings = new Settings;
00112     return settings;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void Settings::destroy()
00116 {
00117     if(settings != 0)
00118         delete settings;
00119 }

00306 QString Settings::getPDFPaperSizeString() const
00307 {
00308     if(PDFPaperSize == 0)
00309         return "Letter (8.5 x 11in)";
00310     if(PDFPaperSize == 1)
00311         return "A4 (8.27 x 11.69in)";
00312     if(PDFPaperSize == 2)
00313         return "Universal (8.27 x 11in)";
00314     if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00315         return "Custom";
00316     else
00317         return "";
00318 }

00373 QString Settings::getPDFPermissionsString() const
00374 {
00375     QString string("");
00376 
00377     if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint)
00378         string += "No-Print";
00379     
00380     if(PDFPermissionsNoModify)
00381     {
00382         if(string != "")
00383             string += ", No-Modify";
00384         else
00385             string += "No-Modify";
00386     }
00387 
00388     if(PDFPermissionsNoCopy)
00389     {
00390         if(string != "")
00391             string += ", No-Copy";
00392         else
00393             string += "No-Copy";
00394     }
00395 
00396     if(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00397     {
00398         if(string != "")
00399             string += ", No-Annotate";
00400         else
00401             string += "No-Annotate";
00402     }
00403 
00404     if(string == "")
00405         string += "All";
00406 
00407     return string;
00408 }
